admissionRequirements.programName: Master of Science in Computer Science
eligibilityCriteria: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
Minimum GPA of 3.0 on a 4.0 scale.
Proficiency in programming languages like Python, Java, or C++.
requiredDocuments: Official transcripts from all previous institutions.
Proof of English proficiency (e.g., TOEFL/IELTS scores, if applicable).

admissionRequirements.programName: Bachelor of Arts in English Literature
eligibilityCriteria: Minimum SAT score of 1200 or ACT score of 25.

career_info.summary: This text outlines potential career paths following a specific course, including roles like Forensic Auditor, Forensic Executor, Investigative Officer, Legal Counselor, Forensic Expert, Forensic Scientist, and Forensic Engineer. It also mentions that students from this program typically receive average annual packages ranging from 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA upon placement.
career_info.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Forensic Auditor
• Forensic Executor
• Investigative officers
• Legal counselors
• Forensic Expert
• Forensic Scientist
• Forensic Engineer
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA

It also includes administrative details such as tenders, fees, visa guidelines, and a mentoring portal.
